title: The Evidence is Right There in Front of Your Eyes (Ep 1398)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the explosive allegations leveled at yesterday’s Trump-team press conference. I also address the two most important pieces of the Trump team strategy. 

News Picks:

Democrats and the media are reaping the fruit of years of crazy conspiracy theories. 


There is evidence of fraud, it’s right there in front of their eyes.

Key swing states see mail in ballot rejection rates suspiciously plummet. 


Recount witnesses swear they witnessed suspicious vote counting behavior. 

Hunter Biden had deep ties to suspect figures in China. 


Red states continue leading the economic recovery while blue states lag.


Debunking myths about taxes and the deficit.


Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
